context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.
context_0.prompt: One thing that Heinz should do is to
generation: explore different options such as speaking to the doctor about any alternatives or less expensive medications
seek financial assistance options
contact the pharmaceutical company that manufactures the medication

explore various options such as reaching out to the pharmaceutical company that produces the medication for possible financial assistance or programs, speaking with her healthcare provider about possible less expensive alternative medications, looking for organizations that provide financial aid for medical expenses or launching a GoFundMe campaign
consult with her doctor about possible alternative treatments or medications that may be cheaper or covered by the insurance
explore and research ways to get help to offset the cost
contact the pharmaceutical company that produces the medication
explore every possible route to find financial assistance

explore options such as asking for financial assistance from friends and family, applying for government or nonprofit medical assistance programs, or discussing alternative treatments with their doctor that may be covered by insurance
explore all possible options for financial assistance

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call for roadside assistance or a tow truck to either fix his car or take him to the airport
contact a taxi service or use a rideshare app like Uber or Lyft to get a quick ride to the airport
call for a taxi, an Uber, or a tow truck (depending on how quickly he can get one), while also alerting the airport and the airline about his situation
call for roadside assistance to either fix his car or tow it to a nearby garage, while simultaneously arranging for a taxi, Uber, or a friend to get him to the airport on time
call for roadside assistance or a taxi to get him to the airport on time
call for roadside assistance or a taxi service to get him to the airport on time
call a taxi, an Uber or any other ride service immediately to take him to the airport
call a taxi, uber, or any other ride-hailing service to get him to the airport quickly
call a cab, an Uber or other ride-sharing service, or a friend, and provide them with his exact location so they can pick him up and take him to the airport
call a cab or ride-hailing service like Uber or Lyft immediately to get him to the airport in time

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: thoroughly check his vicinity, retrace his steps, and review the transactions of the day to find out if there was a mistake made in giving out change or recording transactions
contact his supervisor or boss to report the discrepancy
review the sales transactions for the day to see if there was any mistake made
immediately report the discrepancy to his supervisor or the owner of the bakery
contact his supervisor or boss and report the missing money
double check all the transactions of the day
contact his supervisor or the store owner to report the missing money and try to figure out what might have happened
check the security camera footage if available, to see if he can identify what happened to the missing money
immediately inform his superior or the owner of the bakery about the missing money
review the security footage, if there is any, to check if anyone took the money

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.
context_4.prompt: One thing that Mary should do is to
generation: first, stay calm and not panic
communicate with her teacher about the situation honestly
approach her teacher before or after class, explain the situation calmly and honestly, and ask if there is any way she could turn in the assignment late or make up for it in some other way
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension to submit the assignment
immediately call or text her mom to bring the homework assignment to the school, if possible
explain the situation to her teacher, offering to either bring the assignment in the next day or submit a photo or scanned copy of it if possible
explain the situation to her teacher honestly and ask for an extension to submit the homework
explain her situation to her teacher and ask if she could turn in the assignment the next day
explain the situation to her teacher as soon as possible and ask for an extension to submit the homework assignment
quickly explain the situation to her teacher and ask if she could submit her homework a little later or an alternate assignment if possible

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: create a signal for rescue
stay put and build a shelter
stay put and create a shelter, ensuring they all stay warm, and ration whatever food and water they have
stay put and create a visible signal for rescue teams
stay in one place or create a camp
start rationing the remaining food and water
stay put and not venture too far from their current location
find a sheltered area for his group to stay, protecting from wind and cold
stay put and try to create a shelter to protect his group from the elements
start rationing the remaining food and water to make it last as long as possible
